body_html: @yaroslavvb If the model is distributed on a set of ps nodes, will this https://github.com/yaroslavvb/stuff/blob/master/eager_lbfgs/eager_lbfgs.py work ? I think we need to run BFGS loop on the chief node which coordinate the worker and ps nodes...distbelief paper did that...

body: @yaroslavvb If the model is distributed on a set of ps nodes, will this https://github.com/yaroslavvb/stuff/blob/master/eager_lbfgs/eager_lbfgs.py work ? I think we need to run BFGS loop on the chief node which coordinate the worker and ps nodes...distbelief paper did that...
